author: Lora Kolodny
title: Tesla Gigafactory employee tests positive for COVID-19, says internal memo
description: Tesla's vehicle deliveries report for the first quarter of 2020 is expected within a week. Despite direct impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic on its operations in Shanghai and the U.S., the company has yet to withdraw its prior guidance, which said it should com…
content:
An employee at Tesla's sprawling battery plant outside of Reno, Nevada, has tested positive for COVID-19 according to internal communications obtained by CNBC.
KRNV NBC Reno previously reported on the matter on Sunday. 
Tesla's vehicle deliveries report for… [+2937 chars]
